level.text: The following civil infractions and their respective fines set forth in this section refer to bicycles and the operation of bicycles. The fine for any bicycle violation not listed in this section is twenty-five dollars ($25.00).
Carrying objects which prevent operator from keeping one hand on handle bars (§ 1201.6)
Riding on sidewalk where not permitted (§ 1201.9)
